text.section: Subject to the limitations in subsections (b) and (c) of this section, the hotel rental tax rate is the rate that the authorized county sets by resolution.

section.section: Notwithstanding subsection (b)(1) of this section, a code county, other than a code county in the Western Maryland class, may set a hotel rental tax rate that is greater than 3%, but not exceeding 5%, with the unanimous consent of the county commissioners for the county.

Notwithstanding subsection (b)(1) of this section, a code county in the Western Maryland class may set a hotel rental tax rate that is greater than 3%, but not exceeding 8%, with the unanimous consent of the county commissioners for the county.

text.section: The hotel rental tax rate in Washington County is 6%.
